offlineMode.prompt: Enable offline mode to manage and compose mail, contacts and appointments when you're not connected to the Internet.

enable.title: Enable offline mode
enable.prompt: Copies of recent items will be synchronized and saved to this computer. If you're using a shared or public computer, this is not recommended. See Folder Properties to manage individual folder offline settings.

disable.title: Disable offline mode
disable.prompt: You can read and compose new mail, edit and create contacts, and edit and create appointments only when you're connected to the Internet. Recent items will not be saved on this computer.
